thread.title: david lancaster
thread.title_full: YIPPEE TECH reviewed by david lancaster

author: david lancaster
title: david lancaster
text: After one hour . Of my computer being repaired on line, it froze again and could do nothing with it. ..got in touch with them the next day.. and they failed again having me on and off the phone for about a hour .so the following day I rang them and to cancel my yearly subscription, but beware they will not cancel it and keep saying to you they will fix it. When they can not...and the website you get try cancel it does not exist. . So I contacted my bank and they have put a dispute in with this company
